div.p: GPS telemetry program on migratory caribou of the Rivière-aux-Feuilles herd between 2007 and 2014 in Northern Québec, Canada. (DOCX 14 kb)
Largest water bodies used by migratory caribou of the Rivière-aux-Feuilles herd between 2007 and 2014. (DOCX 15 kb)
Breakup and freeze dates of Lake Nichicun, Northern Québec, Canada, 1947–1985. (DOCX 40 kb)

Relationships between the annual breakup and freeze dates of the largest water bodies used by the Rivière-aux-Feuilles caribou and Lake Nichicun in Northern Québec, Canada, and monthly values of the North Atlantic and Arctic Oscillations. (DOCX 28 kb)
